This looks like a regression in property sheet support because we didn't change 
this code for months.

I am rising severity of this problem because it affects everybody currently 
using PDE for selfhosting by rendering tracing control unusable.
*** Bug 9608 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Dejan, this defect was still assigned to you which means that nobody on the UI 
team has looked at this. You also need to changethe ownerhip of the defect.

Please take a look at this defect and if you still think that the UI team needs 
to address this defect reassign this bug to the component owner.

This problem is related to the design flaw of Property Sheet. It does not 
assume that it can ever run outiside the view (e.g. inside a preference page). 
The Property/Value pattern is very common and can be found in dialogs as well. 
It would be a shame not to be able to use property sheet page inside a dialog.

PDE is 'fixing' the problem by providing dummy implementations of action bars 
that do nothing. It would be better if Property Sheet page would not bomb if 
action bars are not set (i.e. when not in the view).

If makeContributions is never called then the defaults action is not created 
and the NPE occurs with selection.
Added null check before referencing the action.
